text: Labyrinth of Passion () is a 1982 Spanish comedy movie directed by Pedro Almodóvar and starring Cecilia Roth, Imanol Arias, Helga Liné, Marta Fernández Muro, Antonio Banderas. ==Other websites== * Category:1982 comedy movies Category:1980s sex comedy movies Category:1982 LGBT movies Category:Spanish comedy movies Category:Spanish LGBT movies Category:Movies directed by Pedro Almodóvar Category:Movies set in Madrid
title: Labyrinth of Passion
